version_description:
Basketball is back and so are in-game stats and plays! theScore has everything you need to stay up to date with your favorite sports.

What's new in 6.4.0:
- Plays tab added for preseason NBA games
- iPad fixes
- Improved NHL goalie stats order
- New content indicators
- Animations and other design enhancements
- Improved Golf and Motorsports event selection
- Loading indicators when on unfavorable network connections
- Ability to hide Featured items in Leagues menu
- Bug fixes and other improvements

Thanks for choosing theScore!

Basketball, football, and hockey are all in full swing - what a time to be alive! theScore is all you need to stay on top of EVERYTHING!

What's new in 6.5.0
- iPhone X display optimizations.
- Made some subtle design improvements, so now we're even better looking ;-)
- Fixed some pesky freezing issues affecting some users.
- Deeper NHL player stats, including 'Stars' of the game.
- Made it easier to access 'Scores' from Favorites page.
- Support for Smart Invert for better visual accessibility.
- More bug fixes and performance updates.

Basketball fans! Boy, do we have an update for YOU!

We've turbocharged our NBA section to deliver the most in-depth stats possible, including:
- New injury indicator on player pages.
- Details on pre-game key players.
- New pre-game team comparisons.
- Details on in-game timeouts.
- In-game 'Bonus' indicator.
- Live 'Who's on the court' indicators within Matchup Stats tabs.
- Post-game 'Top Performer' info.
- Betting information, including live odds movement chart.

On top of all this, we've also:
- Brought our cool new iPhone app design to the iPad.
- Made more optimizations for iPhone X.

What’s New - 6.7.0

Even more stats. Even more info. This update is one for the number junkies!

NHL
Schedule pages now include details on overtime wins, losses, and shootout wins.
How’s your fantasy hockey team doing? Oh. Sorry. Well, we’ve switched up our stats on matchup pages for easier fantasy stat tracking.

NBA
We’ve added +/- details to Matchup, Stats pages.
Full team stats added to NBA team pages.
New ejected / fouled out indicators added to Matchup, Stats pages

Other
3-D touch is back! Just ‘hard press’ on matchups from league scores pages to get a quick snapshot of that game.
You can also now customize the size of the content that appears in news feeds - just head to Settings to try it out.
We’ve also made some improvements to our widget. Don’t forget to add us to your Today View for easy access to live scores and breaking news!

Love theScore? Please leave a review and tell us what you think of this latest update - we read and respond to them all!

Welcome to 6.9.0! Nice.

- We’ve added ‘Video Quality Control’ to Settings for better control over your multimedia.
- Player Cards now include a ‘Live’ indicator to show when they’re playing in a game.
- For hockey fans we’ve added details of on-ice officials for each game.
- We’ve also made some general improvements to our Apple Watch experience.

This update is GOLD (see what we did there?) and makes theScore the only app you need for real-time coverage of the Winter Games in South Korea.

We’ll deliver round-the-clock updates from PyeongChang. Make sure you follow your favorite country to get content and alerts personalized for you!

Our podium-worthy coverage includes:
Breaking news - Every major story covered.
Medal alerts - We’ll notify you the moment your country medals.
Daily recaps - Can’t stay awake into the early hours? Don’t worry, our Daily Recap will get you up to speed.
Results - Real-time coverage of men’s and women’s hockey, skiing, skating, biathlon, and every single event!

Love using theScore? Tell us what you think of this update with a review in the App Store - we read and respond to them all!

HUGE update for golf fans right in time for The Masters! For the first time you can now follow individual golfers - yes, including Tiger - and get notifications, including breaking news and scores. Our entire golf section has been given a massive facelift, with stunning new course imagery (hi Augusta), as well as player profiles complete with the latest news and stats.

NEW: Introducing FUSE! Ignite the ultimate integration between sports content and betting.

For US-based sports fans who also have theScore Bet app, you can now seamlessly navigate from box score to betting faster than ever. Simply find betting options you like on the matchup page and tap to begin building your bet slip right from theScore app. Then hit 'Add to S|Bet' to jump to theScore Bet to complete the wager.

We've also added easy access to S|Bet from our polls in public chat, so with a few taps, you can vote on any poll and then jump over to theScore Bet to place the actual wager.

Make sure you have Bet Mode turned-on, and check out the awesome integrations of theScore FUSE!

NEW: Introducing FUSE! Ignite the ultimate integration between sports content and betting.

For US-based sports fans who also have theScore Bet app, you can now seamlessly navigate from box score to betting faster than ever. Simply find betting options you like on the matchup page and tap to begin building your bet slip right from theScore app. Then hit 'Add to S|Bet' to jump to theScore Bet to complete the wager.

We've also added easy access to S|Bet from our polls in public chat, so with a few taps, you can vote on any poll and then jump over to theScore Bet to place the actual wager.

Make sure you have Bet Mode turned-on, and check out the awesome integrations of theScore FUSE!

Love using theScore? Please leave a review in the App Store - we read and respond to them all!

NEW: Even more ways to talk sports - ‘Chat’ is now available in League sections and Exclusive news rivers!

Following the popularity of this feature in our Box Scores, you can now also connect and engage with other sports fans around the latest breaking news and developments from the leagues and topics you love by tapping ‘Chat’ when you see it at the top of the screen. Chat is currently available across all major leagues (inc. NFL, NBA, MLB, NHL and others) with more to come, as well as Exclusive rivers like NFL Fantasy News and Betting News.

So update to the latest version of theScore and join the conversation NOW!

NEW: Introducing Bet Section - your dedicated home for all things betting-related! Bet Section provides an unparalleled cross-platform media and betting experience, featuring deeper integrations between theScore and our award-winning mobile sportsbook, theScore Bet:

*Personalized Markets: We’ll surface the most relevant markets available on theScore Bet based on your favorite teams and leagues, making it quick and easy to get in on the action.

*Track Your Bets: You can now automatically follow any wagers you’ve placed on theScore Bet and see real-time cash-out offers, enabling you to focus fully on the game.

*Exclusive Promos: Get exclusive promotions personalized for you!

*Community Polls: What are fans on theScore saying about the latest game lines? Take a look, cast your vote, and start building your betslip!

Plus, we’ve also introduced a new single log-in for users with both theScore and theScore Bet, creating an even smoother cross-app user experience.

Bet Section is available in the United States to users with Bet Mode enabled. Users must be located in a state where theScore Bet accepts wagers (currently Colorado, Indiana, and New Jersey) to place or track bets. Bet Mode can be managed by visiting your Account page.
